div.p: You can easily find your answer by typing any keyword you are searching for. An example: You want to know how to demolish a building? Just type demolish and see what answers relate to this keyword.
Do you prefer searching via a normal sitemap as you know from a Wiki or a FAQ? No problem at all, just use the Answers sitemap-navigation to find your answer.

Prerequisites for research: None
Prerequisites for training: Barracks

Clubswingers are the cheapest unit in Travian. They are quickly trained and have medium attack capabilities but their armour isn't the best. Clubswingers are almost defenceless against cavalry and will be ridden down with ease.

td.strong: Resource/Time needed for upgrading troops in the smithy
